column4: i removed network-manager or nw-applet from my toolbar, how to i re-add it back?
isn't there a right-click option to add applets to your panel ?
running without panels on xubuntu sorry
it might be the notification area that you want to re-add, right click and see if adding that solves things (getting this from http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=289459)
